short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find & Download images on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to download image?
- The extension asks you to get a required permission if you haven't give required permission while installing.
- Visit a website which contains images after the extension has been installed.
- Click the extension icon on top-right corner of browser window.
- Filter by website, source domain, content type, width and height to find image that you wish.
- Click Download button.
